english.segment1: I thought I heard your voice. Last night. Carried on the wind, Singing lines from old songs, Calling out all our names again.
english.segment2: I would have followed you. All the way back home. To where our lives were long. As bending rivers in the sun.
english.segment3: Sweet Grace, mi alma Linda, I sing this song for you. Sweet Grace, And I imagine Heaven singing too, Singing out for you.
english.segment4: I dream of your adobe house. Small beneath the stars -. The river and the silver moon. Behind the crumbling barn.
english.segment5: I dream of beaded necklaces. Sparkling on your skin, The aspens turning golden. In the gray September rain.
english.segment6: Sweet Grace, These memories bring me. Close to you once more, Your stories and your gentle laughter. Calling from your door.
english.segment7: Sweet Grace, mi alma Linda, I sing this song for you, And I imagine Heaven singing, Angels dancing too, Dancing right along with you. Dancing along with you.
english.segment8: I dream of the. Golden melting sunlight. The blue and silver moon. Sweet Grace, sweet Grace
english.segment9: I thought I heard your voice. Last night. Call your children home. Sweet Grace
